Package gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity

Object-oriented transitive closure and reduction algorithms.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Closure A closure provides the successor set for every node of some graph, i.e. all the reachable nodes from a particular node.
MutableSuccessorSet A mutable SuccessorSet.
PathFinder An object that can answer whether there exists a path from a node to another.
SuccessorSet Represents a set of nodes, used to model successor sets in Closure.
Transitivity.SuccessorsListener Callback that can process a graph's node and its set of successors.
 

Class Summary
PathFinders Static factories of PathFinder instances.
SuccessorSetFactory A factory of SuccessorSet.
Transitivity Transitive closure and reduction algorithms for directed graphs.
 

Package gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity Description

Object-oriented transitive closure and reduction algorithms.

See Efficient Transitive Closure Computation in Large Digraphs for the algorithms that this package is based on.
